attributes.action: Only sell silent fireworks, REMOVE the bang and protect our animals!
attributes.additional_details: When you watch a firework display you watch and look at the colours not the BANG noone can see the bang however our animals can hear it 10 x more than us, And its unfair why should they have to suffer for other peoples stupidity. Remove the bang from all fireworks, BANGS ARE NOT NEEDED ALL THEY DO IS CAUSE A NUSIENCE!!
attributes.background: Hear our cry for help, To help protect our animals and loved ones animal cruelty is not right we want some justice for animals and wildlife!

rejection.details:
All fireworks make a noise, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reduce the decibel limit on fireworks to 85 decibels, to reduce impact: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622900
